sentences: Born in Washington, D.C., Colón moved from there to Puerto Rico at the age of five.
He was active in municipal and collegiate sports, martial arts, and amateur theater, and worked with various local pop music groups.
In 1976, Colón moved to New York City to work with the drummer Julito Collazo.

Colón is a practitioner of Tai Chi Cuan, and an American pioneer black belt Senior Instructor in the Israeli self-defense system Krav-Maga, certified by the Wingate Institute of Israel and Krav-Maga International, Inc.  He was the first elected Vice-President of the American Association of Krav maga Instructors (AAKMI), nowadays known as The Krav maga Federation.
He currently holds the rank of Professor Black Belt Dan 2.
